sub-events.comment: If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
If the MOB isn't running, then he's walking.

events.comment: Zed and Yutmo are a couple of tough guys.

sub-events.comment: Max doesn't care too much for Zed's stab at their working relationship.
When message is halfway done, set animation.
Zed and Max pay attention to Yutmo's request, sort of.
When message is halfway done, set animation.
Max and Zed laugh at Yutmo's threat.

events.comment: Max gets knocked down the cliff.

sub-events.comment: Yutmo attacks. Zed dodges, but Max is hit and gets knocked down.
Max falls off the cliff.
The two Thugs jump after him.
Max gets up. Thugs regain collision.

events.comment: Zed drops the dynamite and opens the path for Max to fight Yutmo.
Go above a certain Y coord to activate boss fight.

sub-events.comment: If the MOB is moving we set the direction to the movement angle.
If the angle is negative (Construct 2 uses -90 instead of 270), we add 360 in order to pick the proper animation.
If the MOB isn't running, then he's walking.

events.comment: If the intro quest is not completed, do not allow the Player to leave.
